card.name: Superhero Set Archetypes SUP
card.text: {WU}: Flash Control {UB}: Token Death {BR}: Conspire Control {RG}: Energy {GW}: Backup Counters OR Battalion {WB}: Sidekick Aristocrats {UR}: Draw Two {BG}: Ramp w/Reanimator Subtheme {RW}: Supercharge {GU}: Self-Bounce OR Backup Counters

card.name: UM06 Loyal Underling
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Sidekick {1}{W}{B} ({1}{W}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's 1/1. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: UM07 Steel Heights Renegade
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, you may discard a card. If you do, create two Mission tokens. (They're colorless battles an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, draw a card.")

card.name: UM09 Overclock
card.text: When this enchantment enters, you get {E}{E}. Whenever you get one or more {E}, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: UM03 Head Honcho
card.text: When this creature enters, create two 1/1 blue, black, and red Minion creature tokens. Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: UM09 Dynamic Duo
card.text: Haste Supercharge — Create a 1/1 red and white Warrior creature token that's tapped and attacking. (Whenever this creature attacks, you get {E}. Then you may spend {E}{E}{E} to activate its supercharge ability.)

card.name: UM03 (BR Arcun)
card.text: Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.) Exile the top card of your library and up to one target creature card from your graveyard. You may play cards exiled this way until the end of your next turn.

card.text: Reach, deathtouch When this creature enters, it deals 4 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle.

card.name: UM01 (WU Creature)
card.text: Flash Flying At the beginning of your end step, if you haven't cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and you gain 1 life.

card.name: UM07 (UR arcun)
card.text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 colorless Drone artifact creature token with flying.
